inclusion.criterion: carotid stenosis associated with ipsilateral cerebral ischemic infarct/s on CT or MRI/DWI imaging
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: referred and accepted by the study center for CAS as per local standard referral pathways and study center routine
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient accepts follow-up scheme and consents to follow-up visits
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: surgery within the preceding 30 days or planned surgery within 30 days after CAS
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of cerebral stroke with documented/known cause other than carotid disease
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no prior syncope occasional HA, Denies CP/SOB

notes: 74M hx of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD was referred to cardiology for evaluation of PVD
